ComicInfo.Title: Abandoned on Earth!; The End!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Abandoned on Earth!: Odin defeats Forsung and demands all Asgardians return. Thor refuses and his powers are removed (except Asgardian Strength). The Ringmaster hypnotizes Thor into joining the Circus of Crime.
The End!: Alibar and Hogun defeat Mogul's spotted plague.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:30:02. [Issue ID 21374]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Odin,Bruto the Strong Man [Bruce Olafson]],Circus of Crime [Ringmaster [Maynard Tiboldt],Balder,Human Cannonball [Jack Pulver],Brona,Clown [Eliot Franklin],Luigi Gambonno,Princess Python [Zelda DuBois],Forsung (death)],Sif,Ernesto Gambonno,Enchanters Three [Magnir,Thor [Donald Blake]
